column.p:
We generally recommend the use of the mailing list maltcms-user for novice users of Maltcms, ChromA and ChromAUI. This is the place to get in contact with the developers quickly and ask questions on just about everything. You can subscribe to the mailing list here
or post a message anonymously, which will then be published at the list moderator's discretion. If you discover bugs and are not sure on how to report them, we would also recommend to post your findings on the list, so that we can create a bug tracker item for you.

If you happen to stumble across bugs in Maltcms or any associated application, we would appreciate your feedback. We provide a publicly accessible issue tracker, which does not require you to have an account at sourceforge. However, in order to be able to contact you, we recommend to register an account with sourceforge, or register on the mailing list, where you can also submit a bug report directly.
